golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Marfan syndrome
2. Ehlers-Danlos syndrome, hypermobility type
3. Neurofibromatosis type 1
4. Adolescent idiopathic scoliosis
5. Osteogenesis imperfecta
6. Friedreich's ataxia
7. Metabolic myopathies (e.g., Pompe disease)
8. Spinal muscular atrophy
9. Connective tissue disorders (e.g., Loeys-Dietz syndrome)
10. Congenital muscular dystrophies (e.g., Fukuyama congenital muscular dystrophy)
